category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_Upload_Vendor_Part_Selection_Criteria
preference.preference_description: Defines the mode for Vendor Parts selection in the upload to International Material Data System (IMDS) process in the Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration application. Please ensure that the same value is specified for the "IMDS_Upload_Vendor_Part_Selection_Criteria" variable defined in the stylesheet (refer to the preference "IMDS_upload_xsl_name") Valid values are: * 0: Selects the single vendor part with a status as defined by the preference "IMDS_Uploadable_Vendor_Part_Status". This is the default value. * 1: Selects all the vendor parts with a status as defined by the preference "IMDS_Uploadable_Vendor_Part_Status". * 2: Selects all vendor parts irrespective of their statuses.
